text: Avantan unkalai ippuviyil (unkalukku munniruntavarkalin) piratinitikalaka amaittan. Akave, (unkalil) evarkal nirakarikkirarkalo avarkalin nirakarippin ketu avarkal mitecarum. Inta nirakarippavarkalin nirakarippu avarkalutaiya iraivanitattil avarkalukku kopattai tavira (veretanaiyum) atikappatuttavillai. Inta nirakarippavarkalin nirakarippu avarkalukku nastattaiye tavira (veretanaiyum) atikappatuttavillai
